question: Ni ikihe icyapa gisobanura umuhanda w'icyerekezo kimwe:
Niki umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga yakora ageze hafi y'inzira ifunganye  igihe ahuye n'ikindi kinyabiziga giturutse mukindi cyerekezo?
answers: Agomba kuguma mumwanya yarimo agategereza gutambuka kwikindi kinyabiziga
kugabanya umuvuduko no gusiga umwanya uhagije hagati y'ibinyabiziga byombi
gutegereza ko undi muyobozi w'ikinyabiziga ava mu muhanda
gutwarira ikinyabiziga mu muhanda hagati kugirango abandi bayobozi bahagararare

question: Ni iki umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga yakora ahuye n'ishyo ry'amatungo munzira nyabagendwa?
answers: Kwatsa amatara maremare n'amagufi no gutambuka vuba bishoboka
Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga agomba kugabanya umuvuduko no gutambukana ubwitonzi
Kuvuza ihoni kugirango ayo matungo  atambuke

question: Ibinyabiziga bikurikira bigomba gukorerwa isuzumwa rimwe mu mezi 6:
answers: Ibinyabiziga bigenewe gutwara ibintu birengeje toni 3.5

question: Icyapa cy'inyongera kerekana aho bagobokera ibinyabiziga kirangwa n'amabara akurikira:
Iki cyapa gisobanura iki ?
answers: Iherezo ry' umuhanda urombeje w'ibice byinshi
Birabujijwe kunyura mu mu muhanda w' ikindi cyerekezo

question: Icyapa cyerekana uburebure bw'igice cyatera ibyago cyangwa bw'ahantu amabwiriza y'icyo cyapa agomba gukurikizwa kirangwa n'ubuso n'ibimenyetso bikurikira:
Iki kimenyetso kiri mu muhanda kivuze iki ?
answers: Umuyobozi abujijwe kurenga umurongo wera ucagaguye  cyeretse mugihe bitateza icyago
Biremewe kunyuranaho ariko nturenge umurongo wera ucagaguye

question: Umuyobozi w' ikinyabiziga  agendera inyuma y'ikindi kinyabizaga  akaba adateganya kukinyuraho  yakora iki ?
answers: kuguma inyuma yacyo kugirango yemerere ibindi binyabiziga gutambuka
kuguma yicyo kinyabiziga hagati mu muhanda
gutwarira inyuma ye umwegereye cyane kugirango  ureke ibindi binyabiziga bibanyureho
gutanga ibimenyetso kubindi binyabiziga ko byabanyuraho

question: Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga yakora iki igihe ageze ku  kazamuko gashinze cyane ?
answers: Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga agomba kugabanya umuvuduko akaguma kuruhande rw'iburyo yirinda  ibyago
Gukandagira ikirenge cya amburiyage no  kuvuza ihoni ryo kumunyesha
Kugumana umuvuduko n'ikirekezo wari ufite mu muhanda

question: Iyo itara ry'umuhondo rimyatsa rikoreshejwe mu masangano y'amayira ahwanyije agaciro rishyirwa ahagana he:
answers: Igisubizo cya mbere n'icya kabiri ni ukuri

question: Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga yakora iki ahuye n'ikinyabiziga  giturutse mukindi kerekezo, gicanye amatara  yumuhondo aburira ?
answers: Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga agomba kugabanya umuvuduko no gutambukana ubwitonzi

question: Ku mihanda ibyapa bikurikira bigomba kugaragazwa ku buryo bumwe:
Iki kimenyetso kiri mu muhanda kivuze iki ?
answers: Wegereye icyapa cyo  guhagarara umwanya muto

question: Iyo kuyobya umuhanda ari ngombwa bigaragazwa kuva aho uhera no kuburebure bwawo n'icyapa gifite ubuso bw'amabara akurikira:
answers: Inkomane y'aho umuhanda umwe urasukira iburyo

question: Ibyapa bibuza n'ibitegeka bikurikizwa gusa aha hakurikira:
answers: ibyo byapa bishyirwaho hakurikijwe intera ibitandukanya
mu gice cy'inzira nyabagendwa kiri hagati yaho bishinze n'inkomane ikurikiyeho ku ruhande rw'inzira bishinzeho

question: Inkombe z'inzira nyabagendwa cyangwa z'umuhanda zishobora kugaragazwa n'ibikoresho ngarurarumuri. Ibyo bikoresho bigomba gushyirwaho ku buryo abagenzi babibona :
answers: Babona gusa ibumoso bwabo iby'ibara ritukura
Iburyo babona iby'ibara risa n'icunga rihishije gusa
